Package com.dungeon.shop

Class ShopItem

java.lang.Object
com.dungeon.shop.ShopItem
Direct Known Subclasses:
ItemHealthRestore, ItemReroll
public abstract class ShopItem
extends java.lang.Object
An abstract class defining a shop item
